sentence.text: We recently reported a novel human phenotype resulting from a mutation in the critical coding region of the signal transduction gene characterized by facial dysmorphism, severe growth restriction, axial hypotonia, global developmental delay and retinal pigmentary deposits.

We also describe a mouse model harboring a knockdown mutation in the murine signal transduction gene that shared several of the phenotypic elements observed in the signal transduction-deficient human including facial dysmorphism, growth restriction and retinal deposits.
